sentences.en: All those who knew him will admire him for his work.
sentences.cn: 所有认识他的人都敬佩他所做的工作。

sentences.en: He pretends to admire me, though privately he hates me.
sentences.cn: 他假装敬佩我, 虽然他私下仇恨我.

sentences.en: His was a rags-to-riches story and people admire that.
sentences.cn: 他白手起家，人们对他都很钦佩。

sentences.en: I admire his passionate belief in what he is doing.
sentences.cn: 我佩服他对自己的工作所抱的坚定信心。

sentences.en: I admire those explorers who ventured forth to explore new lands.
sentences.cn: 我敬佩那些为发现新大陆而外出的探险家们.

sentences.en: I am content to admire the mountains from below.
sentences.cn: 我满足于从山脚下观赏山景。

sentences.en: I had to admire David's vow that he would leave the programme.
sentences.cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

sentences.en: I had to admire the contortions of the gymnasts.
sentences.cn: 我不得不为这些体操运动员们高难度的扭体动作而赞叹。

sentences.en: I really admire the way she brings up those kids all on her own.
sentences.cn: 我十分佩服她独力把那些孩子抚养大。

sentences.en: I, for one, admire his audacity.
sentences.cn: 比如说，我就很钦佩他的胆识。

sentences.en: In particular I admire Gary Lineker.
sentences.cn: 我特别崇拜加里·莱因克尔。

sentences.en: Sal stood back to admire her work.
sentences.cn: 萨尔退后几步欣赏她的作品。

sentences.en: We admire her dedication to the cause of humanity.
sentences.cn: 我们敬佩她对人类事业的献身精神。

sentences.en: We stopped halfway to admire the view .
sentences.cn: 我们中途停下来观赏风景。

sentences.en: We took time to stop and admire the view.
sentences.cn: 我们特意驻足欣赏风景。

sentences.en: You have to admire her superb draughtsmanship.
sentences.cn: 你不得不佩服她那一流的绘画水平。

sentences.en: You've got to admire her grit.
sentences.cn: 你不得不佩服她的勇气。

words.tran_cn: 令人钦佩的；极好的；值得赞扬的
受人钦佩的；感到羡慕的
美好地，极好地；令人钦佩地
羡慕，赞美；钦佩（admire的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to respect and like someone because they have done something that you think is good

trans.tran_cn: 羡慕， 赞赏， 钦佩
trans.tran_en: to respect and like someone because they have done something that you think is good
